steps.name: the user should be able to verify the payload
post method should be able to use with following endPoint to create a new pet
put method should be used to update the pet status
the user should be able to delete a pet with id

name: Get "available" pets. Assert expected result , Post a new available pet to the store. Assert new pet added , Update this pet status to "sold". Assert status updated , Delete this pet. Assert deletion.
